LanguageData.AllowCorpsesColonist.label: salli yhd.kuntalaisten ruumiit
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.label: salli vieraat ruumiit
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.description: Salli edesmenneiden vieralijoiden ja vihollisten ruumiit.
LanguageData.AllowRotten.label: salli mädäntynyt
LanguageData.AllowRotten.description: Salli eloperäiset esineet, jotka ovat alkaneet mädäntyä.
LanguageData.AllowNonSmeltableWeapons.label: allow non-smeltable
LanguageData.AllowNonSmeltableWeapons.description: Allow weapons which can't be smelted.
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.label: allow plant food
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.description: Allow foods that are of quality equivalent to unharvested plants, like hay.
